tweet: Yesterday I got to help kick off the #RoadTo30 with @enric_sala, a virtual event emphasizing the importance of passing my #30by30 initiative to conserve 30% of our land and water by 2030 and halt the nature crisis. Check it out: https://t.co/VzpTh8ZB13

I led the way on a letter pushing VP Pence to get PPE and testing to wildland firefighters. As fire season approaches, we need to make sure these brave first responders who keep us safe are healthy and strong enough to do so. https://t.co/dxRMCGGaWY

Virtual public meetings & closed comment periods aren't fair to rural & Tribal communities who often lack broadband access & need to focus on the pandemic.

@Interior must extend comment periods, not make rash decisions about development on sensitive land. https://t.co/KdB2bMpVVJ

So many New Mexicans have been calling my office asking us to help #SaveUSPS. There are 3,000+ postal workers in New Mexico and thousands upon thousands more people who depend on the postal service every day. The Senate must get @USPS the relief it needs— this is urgent. https://t.co/oCMSwp2j6p

New Mexico depends on health care workers. Thank you to all the #ImmigrantHealthHeroes in NM & across the U.S. who have dedicated themselves to making this country a better place by keeping people healthy.

I have heard many of their stories firsthand. They deserve our support.

Excited to join my good friend @enric_sala for an event to kick off the #RoadTo30—emphasizing the importance of passing my #30by30 initiative to conserve 30% of our land and water by 2030 and halt the nature crisis. Watch live: https://t.co/VzpTh8ZB13

.@thenewmexican is right. We need to protect the Gila River, which is an irreplaceable treasure of the Southwest and an important part of our state’s outdoor economy.  That’s why @martinheinrich and I introduced legislation to #ProtectTheGila: https://t.co/85y7x2a6or

The Senate must take immediate additional action to help people through the #COVID19 pandemic. We cannot wait.
